review: Dr Mangesh is an embodiment of truly being a doctor. He does not write any unnecessary tests, makes you feel confident about your health and gives friendly advice. It is a welcome change in Bangalore where other hospitals and doctors are running after making more $.

I really liked how Dr Magesh took time to explain the causes of BP and also advised me on doing certain tests to rule out all the causes of high BP. He even told me that most tests will be negative but it's a 1 time thing, just to be sure. The Telma medication worked for me within 2 days of taking it. Will definitely visit him for another consultation in a few weeks after his medicine course

I had a slight chest pain, my ECG showed slight depression but my ECHO and TMT was clear, Doctor ran a fresh ECG and advised me to go ahead for Coronory Angiogram without explaining the procedure and anything abt stent, I leave the doctor and within 2 min, I keep getting calls from Shireen the admission coordinator seeking insurance details. The doctor informed me abt CT Angiogram but started planning for Coronory Angiogram.***** *** ***** **** * **** ** ** ******* ******** *** ***** ** **** * ***** ******* ******* *** **** ***********I immediately went to Narayana Hrudyalaya *** ** **** ****** ****** ***************** *** ** ****** ********* ** **** ********* *** **** ** ** ** *** ** ********* *** *** ***** *** ********** * *** ******** *** ** ***** *** ** ******** **** ** *********** ***** ********** ** ******** ***** ******* ******* ******* ** ********* * ** ***** ***** ** ********** *** ****** ** ********* *** **** ***** ** ***  *** **** ***** ** ********* ********** *** ***** ***** **** * **** ***** *** ***** **** **** **** ******** ********* ** ******** ***** ** ***

review: *** ******* * ***** *** *** **** **** ****** * **** **** **** ** ** ***** He is very friendly and explains everything perfectly. Really boosts our confidence and in short I would say, he is a very good human being.
